amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount that DHS can spend on construction of laboratory facilities (specifically NBAF) by $75 million and to redirect those funds to the research, development, acquisitions, and operations account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect funding within the Science and Technology Research, Development, Acquistion, and Operations account by $75 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 245 (Roll no. 357).
